description: Awaecoco, based in Cartagena, specializes in luxury bottled coconut water, emphasizing 100% natural ingredients and unique flavors. Founded by an industrial designer and chef, the initiative reflects a commitment to health and sustainability. The product is crafted through a meticulous process, ensuring freshness and quality. With a focus on local sourcing and eco-friendly packaging, Awaecoco aims to provide a premium experience while promoting natural hydration and supporting local communities.
name: Awaecoco
